divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving down Interstate 5 and my girlfriend noticed a strobing light so we just watched it. We noticed that it would move in a very weird way. It would zip across the sky in a way a plane could not. We were straining to see it as we were driving, but many many people saw it and were calling in the radio stations. Also news 10 covered the story.
Summary: Flashing, Almost strobing light that moved very irradically
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There was one other sighting in Sacramento on or around November 22nd 2008
